text:
we are running apache-tomcat-7.0.8 on the z/OS environment (IBM Mainframe) and encounter the following problem.
Every night the tomcats are restarted at 01:30 o'clock. After 3 hours about 04:30 o'clock the batch jobs are started and
redeploy the applications. From my point of view the problem is caused by

May 3, 2012 4:30:19 AM org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader modified
SEVERE:     Resource '/WEB-INF/lib/CWYBS_AdapterFoundation.jar' is missing 

But the CWYBS_AdapterFoundation.jar file is located in /webapps/<application>/WEB-INF/lib

Your help is appreciated.

Here is the complete content of logs:

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum, as kindly explained in
http://tomcat.apache.org/bugreport.html#Bugzilla_is_not_a_support_forum

7.0.8 is one of early releases of Tomcat 7. A lot has been fixed since that time. That includes a number of fixes to StandardJarScanner.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
